results.title: Scribbling kitten
results.brief_description: A kitten named Miaow draws on Mr Bear’s wall watched by two mice friends. When Miaow is finally caught he has to wash the drawings off the wall but when the two mice decide to interfere, the chase is on.

results.title: Screwcutting
results.creator_credit: K. Baron Hartley and Brent Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Lathework series”.
The film starts with a short general discussion of screw threads, pitch and shape. The principle of the screw-cutting lathe is illuatrated by mounting a wooden cylinder in the lathe and using a lead pencil instead of a cutting tool.

results.title: Screens and screams [the movie]
results.brief_description: In October 2002, just before opening at Federation Square, ACMI and the City of Melbourne asked the Kids Own Publishing Partnership from Ireland to run a workshop for over 300 primary school students from 8 schools in the city. Each group of kids had a different job to do - some made and filmed shadow puppets, some acted, some digitally animated, and some created an original soundtrack with artists from the Melbourne Symphony Orchestra. The result was the very first Made @ACMI student movie ‘Screens and Screams’
results.description: In October 2002, just before opening at Federation Square, ACMI and the City of Melbourne asked the Kids Own Publishing Partnership from Ireland to run a workshop for over 300 primary school students from 8 schools in the city. The result was the very first Made @ACMI student movie ‘Screens and Screams’

results.title: Screens and screams
results.brief_description: Kids’ Own Publishing Partnership will have a series of workshops and resultant exhibition which aims : to promote reading including visual literacy, to engage children in the creative process of working together towards a shared outcome, to produce a number of digital stories, to stimulate publishing in schools beyond the boundaries of the project, to extend children’s experience as readers and writers and illustrators.

results.title: Screening Nuclear Hazard
results.brief_description: An attempt to show how a complicated and sensitive issue is handled by television. The example used is a BBC Horizon program produced in 1979 and entitled “Elements of Risk”. The film examines the conception, shooting and editing of the program. Begins with a brief discussion of how the same issue is handled by BBC News
